item.title: Bandwidth Selection for Kernel Density estimation: A Review of Fully Automatic Selectors
item.description: Reference Nils-Bastian Heidenreich, Anja Schindler, Stefan Sperlich “Bandwidth selection for kernel density estimation: a review of fully automatic selectors” (2013) // AStA Advances in Statistical Analysis.
